hero.title: Innovative Path to
hero.subtitle: Sustainable Development
hero.description: Explore innovative practices of Sustainable Development Goals through diverse approaches including reports, mini programs, and board games to promote harmonious development of social progress and environmental protection.

reports.title: SDG Reports
reports.description: In-depth research on Sustainable Development Goals, providing professional analysis reports and practical guidance
reports.videosDescription: Get a more intuitive understanding of the core content and practical cases of SDG reports through videos

shenzhenReport.title: Shenzhen SDG Practice Report
shenzhenReport.description: Showcasing innovative initiatives, success stories, and experience summaries of Shenzhen in the practice of Sustainable Development Goals, providing reference for other cities.

cityReport.title: Urban SDG Development Report
cityReport.description: In-depth analysis of the implementation status, challenges and opportunities of urban sustainable development goals, providing professional guidance for urban planners and policy makers.

shenzhenVideo.title: Shenzhen SDG Practice Report - Video Introduction
shenzhenVideo.description: Gain in-depth understanding of Shenzhen's innovative initiatives and successful experiences in the practice of Sustainable Development Goals through video.

cityVideo.title: Urban SDG Development Report - Video Introduction
cityVideo.description: Video interpretation of the implementation status, challenges faced, and future development opportunities of urban sustainable development goals.

miniprogram.title: WeChat Mini Program
miniprogram.description: User mood sharing platform with text and image sharing features
miniprogram.appDescription: A warm mood sharing platform that allows users to record and share daily mood states, supports text descriptions and image uploads, and builds a positive social environment.
miniprogram.qrCodeAlt: Mood Sharing Mini Program QR Code

boardgame.title: SDG Board Game
boardgame.description: Upcoming SDG-themed board game for educational and entertaining sustainable development learning experience
boardgame.gameDescription: Learn Sustainable Development Goals through gamification, making complex concepts vivid and interesting. Suitable for school education, corporate training, and family entertainment.
boardgame.releaseInfo: Stay tuned for our SDG-themed board game, expected to be officially released in Spring 2026

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Looking forward to cooperating with you to jointly promote the realization of Sustainable Development Goals
